mapper.select: select rownum as lot, tmp.* from( select * from auction_view where sysdate between to_date(a_start, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') and to_date(a_end, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') )tmp order by lot desc

select * from( select rownum as lot, tmp.* from( select a_name, a_dt, a_addr1, a_image, art_name, art_artist, art_size, art_dt, art_origin, art_medium, art_sign from auction_view where sysdate between to_date(a_start, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') and to_date(a_end, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') )tmp ) where lot between #{sn} and #{fn} order by lot asc
select count(*) from auction_main where sysdate>to_date(auction_end, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI')
select count(*) from auction_main where to_date(auction_start, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI')>sysdate
select count(*) from auction_view where sysdate between to_date(a_start, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') and to_date(a_end, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI')
